name: Find Him (Almightyzentaco)
description:
Welcome to "Find Him"! A goofy, scribbly, hand drawn platformer with weird characters and lots of vegetables to throw at them.

This is a demo of a work in progress. The project is currently on hold, perhaps forever. But I wanted to share what I have so far. I hope you enjoy it! Feedback is always welcome.

--Controls--

You can change the controls in the options. Default controls below.

Arrows to move.

X - jumps.

Z - runs.

C  - Grab and throw veggies.

---Credits---

All art, and programming by myself.

SFX were mostly generated by BFXR.

Music by Kevin MacLeod.

www.incompetech.com
